instructions: Download and install the free Xfinity Stream mobile app from the App Store (iPhone/iPad), Google Play Store (Android), or the app store associated with your mobile device. Launch the app and sign in using your pre-existing username and password that's associated with your Xfinity cable TV service account. Tap on the Menu icon that's located in the top-left corner of the screen. From the menu that's displayed, tap on the Browse Movies option. Tap on the Filter button (found near the top-left corner of the screen). From the Filters menu, tap on the Available for Download option to see the current list of movies that can be downloaded (as opposed to streamed). Tap on the graphic related to the movie you're interested in. Tap on the Download option.

Download and install the official Netflix mobile app onto your smartphone or tablet for an iOS device or for an Android-based device . Sign in using your existing Netflix account username and password. If you have multiple sub-accounts set up for individual family members, from the Who's Watching? screen, tap on your name or nickname. Tap on the menu icon that's displayed in the top-left corner of the screen on a tablet. If you're using a smartphone, tap on the Search button to access the menu. From the main menu, tap on the Available for Download option. Select the content you want to download by tapping on the graphic associated with a movie (or tap on the Search icon, and then enter a movie title or keyword associated with what you're looking for.) From the movie's description screen, tap on the Download icon.

Download and install the (Amazon) Prime Video movie app for an iOS mobile device or for an Android-based device . Sign in to the app using the email address and password associated with your Amazon Prime account. From the app's main screen, tap on the Movies option. Tap on a graphic for a movie you're interested in. From the movie's description screen, tap on the Download button. Keep in mind, not all movies offered by Amazon Prime Video for streaming are also available for download.
